channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Network Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Network Security

item.title: CVE-2017-1457|2024-09-17T00:25:29.715Z -- ibm -- qradar%20network%20security
item.description: IBM QRadar Network Security 5.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 128376.
